title: Mount Rainier National Park: Connect to MountRainierNPS
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Connect to MountRainierNPS              Connect to MountRainierNPS          Connect to Mount Rainier National Park through our social media sites.  Â    Facebook http://www.facebook.com/MountRainierNPS  Join the Mount Rainier Facebook community! Learn more about Mount Rainier and connect to other fans of the park. Twitter http://www.twitter.com/MountRainierNPS Check the Mount Rainier twitter feed for daily updates on the opening/closing status of the Longmire-Paradise road and other park announcements. Youtube http://www.youtube.com/MountRainierNPS Get behind-the-scenes of park operations and discover another side of Mount Rainier by watching our videos posted on YouTube. Videos produced by Mount Rainier National Park are also available in the Mount Rainier Video Gallery. Flickr http://www.flickr.com/groups/MountRainierNPS Find photos of Mount Rainier and share your own with Mount Rainier's Flickr group.
